locator.name: Locator
locator.description: A basic tool that tells you the exact x- and y-coordinates of a point. However, it uses a lot of energy.

ruler.name: Ruler
ruler.description: Able to measure the distance between two points for a low energy cost, the ruler is useful in many situations.

radius_finder.name: Radius Finder
radius_finder.description: This tool is self-explanatory: it finds the radius of a circle.
